item.title: Setting up Linux on a Chromebook with Crostini
item.description: ChromeOS supports a built in Linux - running inside a container running insde a VM. Turn it on by going to settings and pressing the on button for Linux (beta). This gives us a bare bones Linux install running Debian Stretch. So here goes all the things I did to customize it. Most of these tips are from the reddit crostini wiki, I’ve put all the ones I’m using in one page for a handy reference.
